languages.text: "Знаю, ты хочешь о многом меня расспросить, {name}. И я обещаю ответить на все твои вопросы. Но прошу, давай прежде покинем это ужасное место. Прочь... прочь от кошмаров, что простирают свои стрекала в самые потаенные уголки моей израненной души!"

"I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"
languages.original_text: "Знаю, ты хочешь о многом меня расспросить, {name}. И я обещаю ответить на все твои вопросы. Но прошу, давай прежде покинем это ужасное место. Прочь... прочь от кошмаров, что простирают свои стрекала в самые потаенные уголки моей израненной души!"

traits.locale_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I promise to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart from this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that reach their stings into the darkest recesses of my hurting soul!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I promise to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart from this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that reach their stings into the darkest recesses of my hurting soul!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart from this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that reach their stings into the darkest recesses of my hurting soul!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart from this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that reach their stings into the darkest recesses of my hurting soul!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「聞きたいことがたくさんあるのだろう、{name}様？どんなことにも必ず答えると誓う。だけどまずはこの恐ろしい場所から離れよう。ずっと…遠くへ。我の傷ついた魂の最も暗い奥底に刺し込む悪夢から逃げよう！」
languages.original_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: 「聞きたいことがたくさんあるのだろう、{name}様？どんなことにも必ず答えると誓う。だけどまずはこの恐ろしい場所から離れよう。ずっと…遠くへ。我の傷ついた魂の最も暗い奥底に刺し込む悪夢から逃げよう！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我知道你有很多问题要问我，{name}。我发誓，我会告诉你所有答案，但在此之前，我们先离开这个可怕的地方吧。远离……远离那些刺入我残损灵魂深处的噩梦！”
languages.original_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: “我知道你有很多问题要问我，{name}。我发誓，我会告诉你所有答案，但在此之前，我们先离开这个可怕的地方吧。远离……远离那些刺入我灵魂深处的噩梦！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Sé que tienes muchas preguntas para mí, {name}, y juro que daré respuesta a todas ellas. Pero, por favor, te pido que antes dejemos atrás este terrible lugar. Que nos alejemos... ¡de las pesadillas que clavan sus aguijones en los más oscuros recovecos de mi alma asolada!».
languages.original_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: «Sé que tienes muchas preguntas para mí, {name}, y juro que daré respuesta a todas ellas. Pero, por favor, te pido que antes dejemos atrás este terrible lugar. Que nos alejemos... ¡de las pesadillas que introducen sus aguijones en los más oscuros recovecos de mi alma dolorida!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich weiß, Ihr habt viele Fragen an mich, {name}. Und ich schwöre, Euch alle Antworten zu geben. Aber bitte, lasst uns zunächst aus dieser Hölle entkommen. Fort ... fort vor den Albträumen, die ihre Stachel in die tiefsten Winkel meiner gequälten Seele stoßen!"
languages.original_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, Ihr habt viele Fragen an mich, {name}. Und ich schwöre, Euch alle Antworten zu geben. Aber bitte, lasst uns zunächst aus dieser Hölle entkommen. Fort ... fort von den Albträumen, die ihre Stachel in die tiefsten Winkel meiner schmerzenden Seele stechen!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je sais que vous avez de nombreuses questions à me poser, {name}. Et je fais le serment d'y répondre. Mais avant, je vous en conjure, quittons ce lieu maudit. Quittons... quittons ces cauchemars qui viennent s'ancrer jusque dans les tréfonds de mon âme meurtrie ! »
languages.original_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que vous avez de nombreuses questions à me poser, {name}. Et je fais le serment d'y répondre. Mais avant, je vous en conjure, quittons ce lieu maudit. Quittons... quittons ces cauchemars qui viennent s'ancrer jusque dans les tréfonds de mon âme meurtrie ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bana soracağın çok şey vardır, bunun farkındayım {name}. Her birini de cevaplayacağım, söz veriyorum. Fakat ne olur önce bu korkunç yerden çıkalım. Gidelim... Perişan ruhumun en karanlık köşelerini işgal eden bu karabasanlardan uzaklaşalım!"
languages.original_text: "I know you have many questions for me, {name}. And I vow to give you every answer. But please, let us first depart this terrible place. Away... away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Bana soracağın çok şey vardır, bunun farkındayım {name}. Her birini de cevaplayacağım, söz veriyorum. Ama lütfen önce bu korkunç yerden çıkalım. Gidelim... Perişan ruhumun en karanlık köşelerini işgal eden bu karabasanlardan uzaklaşalım!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
